price: ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߊ߲ ߧߋ߫ ߕߊ߯ ߌ ߘߌ߫ ߛߍߣߍ߲߬ ، ߊ߲ ߧߋ߫ ߒ߬ ߕߊߢߐ߲߯ߓߐߓߊ߯ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
